title: Selling Men's Lingerie ft. MissRemiAshten & Cal
description:
The queen of cooking, Remi Ashten and boyfriend Cal, join Lauren and Jeremy on this week's episode. They discuss Remi's new career endeavors (move over Chrissy Teigen), how each couple handles conflict and more.

Go to MasterClass.com/WILD for 15% off MasterClass.
